thread.title: Your views on today's strikes
thread.title_full: Your views on today's strikes | Meridian - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Your views on today's strikes
text:
Play video Jack S @Steaders123 Follow Been trying to get on a bus for 25 minutes so far, this is absolute chaos https://t.co/hklZCBOCFC
07:36 - 9 Jul 2015 Retweet Reply Favourite Ella @missellaferris Follow First Great Western I blame you for the damage that will be done to my legs when I have to cycle everywhere for the next 48 hours
18:15 - 8 Jul 2015 Retweet Reply Favourite Maureen McAllister @McAllisterandCo Follow Lovely day for a stroll to Waterloo. No #tubestrike woes for me thankfully! http://t.co/uFCfhLAKhK
12:20 - 9 Jul 2015 Retweet Reply Favourite If you have been affected by the tube strikes or have any views, please send them to meridianweb@itv.com or tweet us: @itvmeridian.
Last updated Thu 9 Jul 2015 Read more 4 updates Commuter chaos as train and tube strikes begin Travel Berkshire Dorset Surrey Oxfordshire Hampshire & Isle of Wight
